title: Avatar
description: Avatar component represents a user's identity visually through images, icons, or text.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Avatar is a UI component that visually represents a user's identity. It supports profile images, system icons, and initials, with an optional activity ring to indicate user status.

types.title: Types
types.description: Avatar supports three types: image, icon, and text.

sizes.title: Sizes
sizes.description: Avatar comes in 9 different sizes from 16px to 56px.

activityRing.title: Activity Ring
activityRing.description: Activity ring indicates whether a user is currently active. When inactive, it displays in default state.

combinations.title: Combinations
combinations.description: Various combinations of type, size, and activity ring.

props.title: Props
props.text: Text content, displays first 2 characters (for type='text')
props.activityRing: Show activity ring to indicate active status
